page.title: 08Hobbies and Interests
page.content: IN MY SPARE TIME I DO MY HOBBIES. HOBBIES ARE WHAT YOU DO MOST OF YOUR SPARE TIME.MINE IS MUSICAL INSTRUMENTS.I LIKE PLAYING THE GUITAR .A GUITAR IS A MUSICAL INSTRUMENT WHICH IS MADE OF WOOD AND IT HAS SIX STRINGS.I DO NOT GO TO LESSONS YET BUT I WILL BE GOING THIS SUMMER.I LEARN IT BY MYSELF WHICH IS A WAY TO GET BETTER BECAUSE I HAVE NO-ONE TO TEACH ME JUST YET.I PLAY IT IN MY BEDROOM BECAUSE THE RADIATOR IS NEVER ON.IF THE GUITAR GETS HOT IT COULD RUIN IT.I MAKE DOLLS CLOTHES FOR MY SINDY DOLL.A SINDY DOLL IS A TALL DOLL WITH LONG HAIR.I MAKE THE SINDY CLOTHES BY HAND.WHEN MY MAM AND DAD HAVE SPARE TIME THEY WATCH T.V. AND REST THEMSELVES.IF IT IS A SUNNY DAY I TAKE MY LITTLE BROTHER RICHARD DOWN TO THE REC.MOST OF THE TIME I PLAY WITH MY FRIENDS.MY BEST FRIEND IS JULIE GIBSON. LISA EGGINGTON
